      • writeRepository

        public static void writeRepository(org.openrdf.repository.Repository theRepo,
                                   File theFile,
                                   org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat theFormat)
                            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                   IOException
        Write the contents of the repository to the given file in the specified format
        Parameters:
        theRepo - the repository to write
        theFile - the file to write to
        theFormat - the format to write the RDF in
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if there is an error getting the data from the repository
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the file

      • writeRepository

        public static void writeRepository(org.openrdf.repository.Repository theRepo,
                                   OutputStream theStream,
                                   org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat theFormat)
                            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                   IOException
        Write the contents of the repository to the given stream in the specified format
        Parameters:
        theRepo - the repository to write
        theStream - the stream to write to
        theFormat - the format to write the RDF in
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if there is an error getting the data from the repository
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the stream

      • writeRepository

        public static void writeRepository(org.openrdf.repository.Repository theRepo,
                                   Writer theWriter,
                                   org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat theFormat)
                            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                   IOException
        Write the contents of the repository to the given writer in the specified format
        Parameters:
        theRepo - the repository to write
        theWriter - the writer to write to
        theFormat - the format to write the RDF in
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if there is an error getting the data from the repository
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the writer

      • selectQuery

        public static org.openrdf.query.TupleQueryResult selectQuery(org.openrdf.repository.Repository theRepo,
                                                             org.openrdf.query.QueryLanguage theLang,
                                                             String theQuery)
                                                      throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                                             org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                                             org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Execute a select query.
        Parameters:
        theLang - the query language
        theQuery - the query to execute
        Returns:
        the result set
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if there is an error while querying
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - if the query cannot be parsed
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException - if there is an error while querying

      • constructQuery

        public static org.openrdf.query.GraphQueryResult constructQuery(org.openrdf.repository.Repository theRepo,
                                                                org.openrdf.query.QueryLanguage theLang,
                                                                String theQuery)
                                                         throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                                                org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                                                org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Execute a construct query.
        Parameters:
        theLang - the query language
        theQuery - the query string
        Returns:
        the results of the construct query
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if there is an error while querying
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - if the query cannot be parsed
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException - if there is an error while querying

      • getStatements

        public static org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryResult<org.openrdf.model.Statement> getStatements(org.openrdf.repository.Repository theRepository)
        Return a RepositoryResult over all the statements in the repository.
        Returns:
        an iteration of all statements

      • getStatements

        public static org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryResult<org.openrdf.model.Statement> getStatements(org.openrdf.repository.Repository theRepo,
                                                                                                 org.openrdf.model.Resource theSubj,
                                                                                                 org.openrdf.model.IRI thePred,
                                                                                                 org.openrdf.model.Value theObj,
                                                                                                 org.openrdf.model.Resource... theContext)
        Return a RepositoryResult over the statements in this Repository which match the given spo pattern.
        Parameters:
        theSubj - the subject to search for, or null for any
        thePred - the predicate to search for, or null for any
        theObj - the object to search for, or null for any
        theContext - the contexts for the statement(s)
        Returns:
        an Iterable over the matching statements
